---@class bt_con_fullScreen
local bt_con_fullScreen = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)

function bt_con_fullScreen:initData(data)

end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
function bt_con_fullScreen:doCondition(blackBoard,agent,dt)
    local result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    if blackBoard._enmityIndex == 0 then
        result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    else
        result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
    end
    return result
end

return bt_con_fullScreen
